Todo List

Member Intersect< View0, View1, View2 >::post (Gecode::Home home, View0 a, View1 b, View2 c)
In order to make this method smarter, we can detect if two of the views are the same and in that case prefer to post the equality constraint. This will be only possible when the function same is defined for all the views (i.e. Complement and Constant). For now this function is missing.

Member Join< ViewA, ViewB, ViewC >::post (Gecode::Home home, ViewA a, int j, ViewB b, ViewC c)
What will happen if this propagator is posted with the same view as two of the arguments?.

Member Join< ViewA, ViewB, ViewC >::propagate (Gecode::Space &home, const Gecode::ModEventDelta &)
Add other direction of the constraint.

Member MPG::CPRel::operator<< (std::ostream &os, const GRelation &r)
The implementation of this function relies on an iterator on the tuples of r. I should offer a better way to print the domain in a compressed way

Member MPG::CPRel::read (std::istream &is, int arity)
Perform some checking to guarantee that the elements that are read are representable.

Member PermutedView< View >::desc_
